meanings.definition: A book containing photographs or illustrations, typically used for promotional purposes.
meanings.sent1: I love flipping through viewbooks of different countries to see their beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent2: The school sent me a viewbook showcasing their campus and facilities.
meanings.sent3: The viewbook of puppies was so adorable that it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a viewbook of memories, each page filled with colorful images.
meanings.sent5: The artist's viewbook was a masterpiece, capturing the essence of nature in every page.

meanings.definition: To look at or inspect something closely or with interest.
meanings.sent1: She likes to viewbooks of old artifacts at the museum to learn about history.
meanings.sent2: I viewbooks of different cars before deciding which one to buy.
meanings.sent3: He would viewbooks of clouds for hours, imagining shapes in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The detective could viewbooks of clues in a crime scene effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, she would viewbooks of stars twinkling in the night sky.
